title: B2B Source
description: This Data Type is used to capture B2B/CRM Source identifiers.

xdm:sourceType.title: Source Type
xdm:sourceType.description: Instance or Organization Id of the source data.

xdm:sourceInstanceID.title: Source Instance ID
xdm:sourceInstanceID.description: Name of the platform with the source data.

xdm:sourceID.title: Source ID
xdm:sourceID.description: Identifier of the record from the source data.

xdm:sourceKey.title: Source Key
xdm:sourceKey.description: Unique identifier composed of the sourceType, sourceInstanceId, and sourceId.
